perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the goals, parameters and integration activities outlined in the integration plan, SPI shall develop an integration plan in consultation with the management of the Company as required for combining the business operations of the two companies. For the sake of achieving the purpose of the strategic alliance as set forth in Section 2.01, both Parties acknowledge their mutual intention to, in principle, maintain the Company's employment at levels consistent with the requirements of the Company from time to time.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the clause regarding employee incentives, specifically ensuring terms are 'not less favorable,' introduces legal risk. Japanese labor law provides protections for employees during mergers and acquisitions, requiring fair treatment regarding compensation and benefits. Omitting a commitment to maintaining comparable benefits could lead to legal challenges based on violation of these employee protection laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Japanese Labor Standards Act and related regulations concerning mergers and acquisitions and employee rights.
